about_the_game:
Arcadia Issue 002 - February 2021

Welcome to ARCADIA ! Inspired by old-school tabletop magazines, ARCADIA is MCDM's digital magazine for 5th edition GMs and players. We hope you like it!

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.

Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
